title: Hallucinations and Bad Prompting
subtitle: FUTBOL as the ostensible material
description: A reflective examination of AI hallucination, correction, and epistemic responsibility, using football memory, error, and verification as a lived case study.

motifMap.meaning: Standing guard over truth through correction rather than narrative escalation.

excerpt: You didn’t misremember out of nowhere — you just remembered the power structure instead of the result.

associatedMedia.description: Screenshots of search results and chat transcript illustrating correction of an AI hallucination.

integrity.notes: Filename: hallucinations-and-bad-prompting.phase-pale-moon-guarding.metadata.v2.5.json. Written during Desert Faith period; phase enacted is Pale Moon Guarding. Markers referenced: Relational, Adaptive Witness.
